mapper.select:
select distinct exam.examid, exam.examname from examination exam join exam_curr ec on exam.examid = ec.examid join curricula c on ec.curriculaid = c.curriculaid join Schoolyearterm syt on syt.id = c.termid
not #{control} or
#{currdate} between syt.startdate and syt.enddate and floor(datediff(#{currdate}, syt.startdate) / 7) + 1 = ec.week and WEEKDAY(#{currdate}) + 1= c.weekday and case when DATE_FORMAT(#{currdate}, '%H:%i:%S') between '07:50:00' and '09:50:00' then 1 when DATE_FORMAT(#{currdate}, '%H:%i:%S') between '09:50:01' and '12:00:00' then 2 when DATE_FORMAT(#{currdate}, '%H:%i:%S') between '14:20:00' and '16:20:00' then 3 when DATE_FORMAT(#{currdate}, '%H:%i:%S') between '16:20:01' and '19:00:00' then 4 when DATE_FORMAT(#{currdate}, '%H:%i:%S') between '19:00:01' and '22:00:00' then 5 else 0 end = c.section and c.classno in
#{item}
